title: Calily Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable and Includes a Travel Pouch – Double Rollers – Fine & Coarse / High-Performance Pedicure Tool; Removes Hard Skin & Calluses Fast & Painlessly [UPGRADED]
features: FAST & EFFECTIVE – No Scrubbing and No Rubbing; simply place the device onto the callus, power it on and watch your calluses and hard skin disappear. Features two speeds; choose your desired preference. Effortlessly transforms your skin into feeling silky smooth in mere minutes.
NO BATTERIES NEEDED – Features a built-in rechargeable battery; no need for batteries. Simply recharge the callus remover with the included USB cord.
PERFECT PEDICURE AT HOME – Includes two (2) rollers, a coarse roller and a fine roller. Achieve amazing results in the comfort of your home.

CONVENIENT & EASY TO CLEAN – Cleaning the device after use is a breeze; the roller detaches by the press of a button and can be fully rinsed under tap water then air-dried. Includes a carrying pouch for travel and convenient storage. / QUALITY & DURABLE - The Calily roller heads are made of durable and long lasting fine abrasive material and will last considerably longer than other brands.

SAFE & GENTLE – The Calily Electric Callus Remover is extremely safe; featuring absolutely no blades. This device works by rotating a micro-mineral abrasive roller, which gently buffs away calluses, corns and dead skin. Safe alternative to harsh scrapers and pumice stones. / Upgraded for enhanced performance.
description: The Calily Electric Callus Remover is extremely safe; featuring absolutely no blades. This device works by rotating a micro-mineral abrasive roller, which gently buffs away calluses, corns and dead skin. Safe alternative to harsh scrapers and pumice stones. Includes two (2) rollers, a coarse roller and a fine roller. Achieve amazing results in the comfort of your home.   Cleaning the device after use is a breeze; the roller detaches by the press of a button and can be fully rinsed under tap water then air-dried. Includes a carrying pouch for travel and convenient storage.   Features a built-in rechargeable battery; no need for batteries. Simply recharge the callus remover with the included USB cord.   The Calily roller heads are made of durable and long lasting fine abrasive material and will last considerably longer than other brands.
